-- 유상보수계약 현황으로 sql 튜닝은 불가능하나 client 에서 조건값 분개 오류로 인한 버그는 수정함(2019/04/09) SELECT MAX(A.CHK) CHK, MAX(A.FLAG) FLAG, A.MANDT, A.UPN, A.CST, A.GNO, MAX(A.KND) KND, '' RNO, A.VBELN, MAX(A.ARA_NM) ARA_NM, MAX(A.BSU_NM) BSU_NM, MAX(A.BPM_NM) BPM_NM, (CASE MIN(A.GKD) WHEN '0' THEN '갱신계약' WHEN '1' THEN '전환계약' WHEN '4' THEN '실패회수' WHEN '5' THEN '타사신규' ELSE MIN(A.GKD) END) GKD_NM, MAX(A.NAM) NAM, MAX(A.SPT) SPT, MAX(A.USD) USD, MAX(A.UGS) UGS, MAX(A.UHJ) UHJ, MAX(A.UMS) UMS, SUM(A.AMT)+SUM(A.HMT)+SUM(A.DMT) AMT, SUM(A.AMBT) AMBT, SUM(A.AMT)+SUM(A.AMBT)+SUM(A.HMT)+SUM(A.DMT) AMTT, MAX(A.HYN) HYN, MAX(A.HNT) HNT, MAX(A.HEP) HEP, MAX(A.DYN) DYN, MAX(A.DNT) DNT, MAX(A.SLA_CNT) SLA_CNT, A.GND GND, MAX(A.GND_NM) GND_NM, COUNT(*) CNT, SUM(A.CNT2) CNT2, MAX(A.IJU) IJU, MAX(A.CHB) CHB, MAX(A.CS121_GNO) CS121_GNO, MAX(A.SJU) SJU, MAX(A.SLA) SLA, MAX(A.TAX) TAX, MAX(A.RM2) RM2, MAX(A.ADT) ADT, MAX(A.CYN) CYN, MAX(A.CTP) CTP, MAX(A.FMY) FMY, MAX(A.FMS) FMS, MAX(A.CRS_NM) CRS_NM, MAX(A.GYB) GYB, MAX(A.BLD_NM) BLD_NM, MAX(A.SPC) SPC, MAX(A.SPC1) SPC1, ( SELECT MIN(Z.CS126_USD) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 Z WHERE Z.MANDT = A.MANDT AND Z.CS126_UPN = A.UPN AND Z.CS126_CST = A.CST AND Z.CS126_DDT = '' AND Z.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND Z.CS126_GND = 'D' AND Z.CS126_USD <= MAX(A.USD) GROUP BY Z.CS126_USD FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) FSD, MAX(A.CFP) CFP, MAX(A.CFG) CFG, (SELECT MAX(USERNAME) FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = COALESCE(MAX(A.REQ),'')) REQ, MAX(A.RDT) RDT, MAX(A.GBN1) GBN1, MAX(A.LTC) LTC, MAX(A.LTY) LTY, MAX(A.LTS) LTS, MAX(A.RGS) RGS, MAX(A.RMR) RMR, MAX(A.RAT) RAT, MAX(A.APSTAT) APSTAT , MAX(A.BSUGB) BSUGB, MAX(A.TEA) TEA, MAX(A.TEB) TEB, MAX(A.TE2) TE2, MAX(A.VKGRP) AS VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) AS VKGRP_NM, MAX(A.CURST) AS CURST, MAX(A.BDGBN) AS BDGBN FROM ( SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, CS126A.MANDT, CS126A.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126A.CS126_CST CST, CS126A.CS126_GNO GNO, CASE WHEN COALESCE(CS126A.CS126_KND,'') > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE '' END KND, CS126A.VBELN VBELN, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS126A.MANDT,'CS115',CS126A.CS126_ARA) ARA_NM, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(CS126A.MANDT,CS126A.CS126_BSU) BSU_NM, SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS126A.MANDT,CS126A.CS126_BPM) BPM_NM, (CASE CS126A.CS126_GKD WHEN '2' THEN '0' ELSE CS126A.CS126_GKD END) GKD, CS121A.CS121_NAM NAM, CS121A.CS121_SPT SPT, CS126A.CS126_USD USD, CS126A.CS126_UGS UGS, CS126A.CS126_UHJ UHJ, CS126A.CS126_UMS UMS, CS126A.CS126_AMT AMT, CS126A.CS126_AMBT AMBT, CS126A.CS126_HMT HMT, CS126A.CS126_DMT DMT, CS126A.CS126_HYN HYN, CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END HNT, CS126A.CS126_HEP HEP, CS126A.CS126_DYN DYN, CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DNT, CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_SLA = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END SLA_CNT, CS126A.CS126_GND GND, MM028B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, INT(ZM02.ZSPEC9) CNT2, VALUE(CS157.CS157_IJU,'') IJU, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(CS126A.MANDT,VALUE(CS157.CS157_CHB,'')) CHB, ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CS126A.CS126_PJT, CS126A.CS126_HNO, CS126A.CS126_GNO ORDER BY CS157.CS157_IJU DESC ) AS SEQNO, CS121A.CS121_GNO CS121_GNO, CS121A.CS121_SJU SJU, CS121A.CS121_SLA SLA, CASE WHEN CS126A.VBELN IS NULL THEN '' ELSE VALUE(SUBSTR(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_TAX(CS126A.MANDT, SUBSTR(CS126A.VBELN,3)),9,1),'') END TAX, CS126A.CS126_RM2 RM2, '' ADT, CS126A.CS126_CYN CYN, CS126A.CS126_CTP CTP, CS126A.CS126_FMY FMY, CS126A.CS126_FMS FMS, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CODE1 = 'CS180' AND CODE2 = CS126A.CS126_CRS AND LANG = #G_LANG#) CRS_NM, CS126A.CS126_GYB GYB, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS126A.MANDT,'CS123',A.BLD) BLD_NM, CASE WHEN ZM02.ZSPEC12 > '' THEN ZM02.ZSPEC12 ELSE ZM02.ZSPEC2 END SPC, ZM02.ZSPEC1 SPC1, CS126A.CS126_CFP CFP, CS126A.CS126_CFG CFG, CS126A.CS126_REQ REQ, CS126A.CS126_RDT RDT, CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_SLA = 'Y' THEN '기술용역' ELSE ( CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_GND = 'C' THEN '유상공사' ELSE ( CASE WHEN CS126A.CS126_KND = '' AND CS126A.CS126_HYN <> 'Y' THEN 'POG' WHEN CS126A.CS126_KND = '' AND CS126A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 'PRTS' WHEN CS126A.CS126_KND > '' AND CS126A.CS126_HYN <> 'Y' THEN 'FM' WHEN CS126A.CS126_KND > '' AND CS126A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 'FRTS' ELSE '' END ) END ) END GBN1, CS126A.CS126_LTC LTC, CS126A.CS126_LTY LTY, CS126A.CS126_LTS LTS, CS126A.CS126_RGS RGS, CS126A.CS126_RMR RMR, CS128.CS128_RAT RAT, H.APSTAT APSTAT , WB010.BSU_GB BSUGB, CS121A.CS121_TEA TEA, CS121A.CS121_TEB TEB, CS121A.CS121_TE2 TE2, WB010.VKGRP AS VKGRP, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS126A.MANDT,'VKGRP',WB010.VKGRP) VKGRP_NM, FI2021.CURST AS CURST, DECODE(CS126A.CS126_BDGBN,'X','1','') AS BDGBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 H ON H.MANDT = CS126A.MANDT AND H.DOCNO = CS126A.CS126_DNO AND H.DOCKIND = '4' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST128 CS128 ON CS128.MANDT = CS126A.MANDT AND CS128.CS128_GNO = CS126A.CS126_GNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 CS157 ON CS157.MANDT = CS126A.MANDT AND CS157.CS157_UPN = CS126A.CS126_UPN AND CS157.CS157_CST = CS126A.CS126_CST AND CS157.CS157_PJT = CS126A.CS126_PJT AND CS157.CS157_HNO = CS126A.CS126_HNO AND CS157.CS157_SEQ = CS126A.CS126_SEQ AND CS157.CS157_GND IN ('C','D'), SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFIT2021 FI2021 ON FI2021.MANDT = CS121A.MANDT AND FI2021.KUNNR = CS121A.KUNNR AND FI2021.PJTCD = CS121A.CS121_UPN AND FI2021.BUKRS = '1000', SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028D, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 ZM02, SAPHEE.ZCST111 A WHERE CS126A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126A.MANDT = CS121A.MANDT AND CS126A.MANDT = MM028B.MANDT AND CS126A.MANDT = MM028D.MANDT AND CS126A.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND CS126A.CS126_UPN = CS121A.CS121_UPN AND CS126A.CS126_CST = CS121A.CS121_CST AND CS126A.CS126_GND = MM028B.CODE2 AND CS126A.CS126_GKD = MM028D.CODE2 AND CS126A.CS126_BSU = WB010.LGORT AND WB010.LGORT > '' AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS119' AND MM028D.CODE1 = 'CS130' AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND CS126A.CS126_GND IN ('C','D') AND CS126A.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126A.CS126_PST = 'A5' AND CS126A.CS126_GNO = '' AND CS126A.MANDT = ZM02.MANDT AND CS126A.CS126_PJT = ZM02.POSID AND CS126A.CS126_HNO = SUBSTR(ZM02.POSID_1,7,3) AND CS126A.MANDT = A.MANDT AND CS126A.CS126_PJT = A.PJT AND CS126A.CS126_HNO = A.HNO
AND CS126A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS126A.CS126_BSU = #BSU#
AND CS126A.CS126_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB010.VKGRP = #TEM#
--====================================
AND SUBSTR(WB010.VKGRP,1,2) = #DPT#
--====================================
AND SUBSTR(CS126A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W')
AND SUBSTR(CS126A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('J')
AND SUBSTR(CS126A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('G')
AND SUBSTR(CS126A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('F')
) A WHERE A.SEQNO = '1' -- 온핸드 이관 추가에 따라 한건 만 가져오기 GROUP BY A.MANDT, A.UPN, A.CST, A.GNO, A.VBELN, A.GND ORDER BY A.MANDT, A.UPN, A.CST, A.GNO WITH UR
